kpi.name: M512B2C2

kpi_info.title: Other
kpi_info.use: The number of cells with other than one-bit errors. This counter shows the number of incoming ATM cells discarded because of a Header Error Check (HEC) violation. HEC is used for checking and correcting errors in the ATM cell header. One-bit errors are corrected. If there are other errors in the header, they cannot be corrected and the cell is discarded.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of cells with other than one-bit errors
